HARD SKILLS
Hi, my name's Ilya Dokuchaev and i'm frontend developer
  • About my background

    Let me introduce myself. SInce 2016 I work in IKEA Russian retail group as a senior cook, before that I had 5 years of hotel and hospitality business background.

  • What it gives

    From a helicopter view this acquaintance gives me high entrepreneurial skills. I can work with multi-tasking, under pressure, being able to find a solution in no time, get things rolling and after that take the responsibility of my decisions.

  • How do I work

    I always give myself feedback when the job is done. From my perspective it helps to find solutions for similar tasks even better and quicker.

  • About my soft skills

    In winding up for my soft skills set I'm a responsible open-minded forward thinking type of person with troubleshooting point of view and cute as a bug's ear.

  • About my hard skills

    Today what boils down to my hard skills I know theoretically and can apply practically :

    • how does the internet work
    • HTTP
    • DNS
    • I write valid, semantic, responsive and adaptive code
    • git
    • DOM
    • native JS syntax
    • i know how to work with package managers building tools and task runners
    • CSS preprocessors
    • ES6+ and modular JS
    • C1 level of english

    Lately I have started to learn frameworks such as react/redux and vue.js/vuex. As for me frontend become today more than money earning work but a lifestyle and dream job, as the days pass i became in love with programming.
